Handling the ball

Handling the ball involves a deliberate act of a player making contact with the
ball with the hand or arm.

The following must be considered:
• the movement of the hand towards the ball (not the ball towards the hand)
• the distance between the opponent and the ball (unexpected ball)
• the position of the hand does not necessarily mean that there is an offence
• touching the ball with an object held in the hand (clothing, shinguard, etc.)
is an offence
• hitting the ball with a thrown object (boot, shinguard, etc.) is an offence

以下情形一定要被考慮
• the movement of the hand towards the ball (not the ball towards the hand)
手向足球的移動(不是足球向手的移動)

手的位置不一定會成犯規的理由
• touching the ball with an object held in the hand (clothing, shinguard, etc.)
is an offence
以手中的物品接觸足球(例如衣服, 護脛等等)就會犯規
• hitting the ball with a thrown object (boot, shinguard, etc.) is an offence
以拋出的物品(例如足球鞋, 護脛等等)接觸足球就會犯規

Handling the ball

Handling the ball involves a deliberate act of a player making contact with the
ball with the hand or arm.

The following must be considered:
• the movement of the hand towards the ball (not the ball towards the hand)
• the distance between the opponent and the ball (unexpected ball)
• the position of the hand does not necessarily mean that there is an offence
• touching the ball with an object held in the hand (clothing, shinguard, etc.)
is an offence
• hitting the ball with a thrown object (boot, shinguard, etc.) is an offence

以下情形一定要被考慮
• the movement of the hand towards the ball (not the ball towards the hand)
手向足球的移動(不是足球向手的移動)
• the distance between the opponent and the ball (unexpected ball)
對方與足球的距離(在未能預計球路時的情況)
• the position of the hand does not necessarily mean that there is an offence
手的位置不一定會成犯規的理由
• touching the ball with an object held in the hand (clothing, shinguard, etc.)
is an offence
以手中的物品接觸足球(例如衣服, 護脛等等)就會犯規
• hitting the ball with a thrown object (boot, shinguard, etc.) is an offence

譯得差唔好屌
The following must be considered:
以下情形一定要被考慮
• the movement of the hand towards the ball (not the ball towards the hand)
手向足球的移動(不是足球向手的移動)
• the distance between the opponent and the ball (unexpected ball)
對方與足球的距離(在未能預計球路時的情況)
• the position of the hand does not necessarily mean that there is an offence
手的位置不一定會成犯規的理由
• touching the ball with an object held in the hand (clothing, shinguard, etc.)
is an offence
以手中的物品接觸足球(例如衣服, 護脛等等)就會犯規
• hitting the ball with a thrown object (boot, shinguard, etc.) is an offence
以拋出的物品(例如足球鞋, 護脛等等)接觸足球就會犯規



第二點
the distance between the opponent and the ball (unexpected ball)
